answers.answer: helloGiven your age and minimal medical history, it is unlikely that it is the type of heart problem associated with poor blood flow, ie heart attack. I would suggest that you see your pcp to be evaluated and to have an ekg. The most likely cause of the discomfort is costochondritis (inflammation of your ribs and cartilage)I would use this small scare as motivation to overhall your exercise and get your thorough physical exam and checkup. visit www.personalwellnesswheel.com for more information on a preventative health strategy.Good luck
